程序包 Jest

类 SuitCard

java.lang.Object
Jest.Card
Jest.SuitCard
public class SuitCard
extends Card
SuitCard is a kind of card so it extends the class Card.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    SuitCard​(Value value, Suit suit)
    Constructor of the class SuitCard.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean compare​(SuitCard card)
    To compare two suit cards.
    Suit getSuit()
    To get the suit of the suit card.
    Value getValue()
    To get the value of the suit card.
    void setChar()
    To set the characteristics of the suit card according to the combination of its suit and value.
    void setSuit​(Suit suit)
    To set the suit of the suit card.
    void setValue​(Value value)
    To set the value of the suit card.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Overwrite the function toString() to show the information of a suit card SuitCard.

    从类继承的方法 Jest.Card

    cardEquals, comCard, compareCard, facedown, faceup, getChar, isJoker, showface

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SuitCard

      public SuitCard​(Value value, Suit suit)
      Constructor of the class SuitCard.
      参数:
      value - is the value Value to set.
      suit - is the suit Suit to set.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setValue

      public void setValue​(Value value)
      To set the value of the suit card.
      参数:
      value - is the value to set.

    • setSuit

      public void setSuit​(Suit suit)
      To set the suit of the suit card.
      参数:
      suit - is the suit to set.

    • getValue

      public Value getValue()
      To get the value of the suit card.
      返回:
      type of a Value is the value to get.

    • getSuit

      public Suit getSuit()
      To get the suit of the suit card.
      返回:
      type of a Suit is the suit to get.

    • setChar

      public void setChar()
      To set the characteristics of the suit card according to the combination of its suit and value.

    • compare

      public boolean compare​(SuitCard card)
      To compare two suit cards. First compare the value of two cards, the card whose value is bigger is the bigger one. If both cards have the same value, then compare their suits. Spades is the strongest suit, then Clubs, Diamonds and Hearts, the same order in the Enum Suit.
      参数:
      card - the card to compared.
      返回:
      type of boolean to show if the instance of the card is bigger or not.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overwrite the function toString() to show the information of a suit card SuitCard.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Card
